definitions: (of a subject or problem) capable of being simplified in presentation or analysis

examples.text: Shakespeare's major soliloquies are not reducible to categories

shortDefinitions: capable of being simplified in presentation or analysis

definitions: (of a polynomial) able to be factorized into two or more polynomials of lower degree.
shortDefinitions: (of polynomial) able to be factorized into two or more polynomials of lower degree

definitions: (of a group) expressible as the direct product of two of its subgroups.
shortDefinitions: (of group) expressible as direct product of two of its subgroups
